description: Chris and Gabby Adcock aim to become the first British pair since 2005 to win a title at the All England Championships.
title: Adcocks target mixed doubles All England Championships title
title_page: Adcocks target mixed doubles All England Championships title - BBC Sport
maintext:
Commonwealth gold medallists Chris and Gabby Adcock will try to become the first British pair since 2005 to win a title at the All England Championships this week.
Athens Olympic silver medal-winning, external duo Nathan Robertson and Gail Emms were the last GB pair to claim an All England title, in 2005., external
The Adcocks, who are married, are seeded sixth.
"It'll be tough, but we believe we can win it," said Chris Adcock.
